text: well this is very surreal here in Moscow
I'm in an English pub with a group of
Russian political activists watching the
American election results on TV now most
of the people here tonight seem to be
supporters of Donald Trump and you can
tell that by the kind of artwork they've
brought with them they've just unveiled
this interesting portrait it's not
exactly ban Gogh but you get the idea
here we've got to Vladimir Putin on the
right over on the left on the left
there's marine lepen
and pride a place in the middle Donald
Trump looking rather like Flash Gordon I
have to say everyone I've spoken to here
tonight has told me that if Donald Trump
was in the White House that would be
good news for Russia Trump is better
because he says all right guys let's
stop having conflicts messed up having
all these hundreds of military bases
that are mainly around our borders let's
admit it and of course it's very fast
political correctness doesn't exist
and for us is very good guy because he's
not political career well a few days ago
Vladimir Putin said it was utter
nonsense to suggest that he favored
Donald Trump in the selection but for
weeks now the state media in Russia has
lavished praise on the Republican
candidate and lambasted Hillary Clinton
there's little doubt that Moscow would
prefer a president Trump to a President
Clinton
